metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10743 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
hostapd before 2.6 does not prevent use of the low-quality PRNG that is reached by an os_random() function call.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10743` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

hostapd - 2.4-0ubuntu6.4
No subscription required

wpagui - 2.4-0ubuntu6.4
wpasupplicant - 2.4-0ubuntu6.4
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> low-quality PRNG is only used as a fallback if /dev/urandom can't be opened

criterions.comment: wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4-0ubuntu6.4').
wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4-0ubuntu6.4').
